Package climatemonitoring.core.gui

Class InputText

java.lang.Object
climatemonitoring.core.gui.Widget
climatemonitoring.core.gui.InputText
Direct Known Subclasses:
InputTextButton, InputTextMultiline
public class InputText extends Widget
The InputText class renders to screen a box to input text and holds the written string. It is also possible to set an error message that will appear under the input box. The error message can be turned on or off however the user likes It can also enforce some conditions, such as disabling spaces or making the input box read only
Version:
1.0-SNAPSHOT
Author:
adellafrattina

  • Constructor Details

    • InputText

      public InputText(String label, String str, String error_msg, int max_chars)
      Initialize InputText fields
      Parameters:
      label - The input text box label
      str - The string that will be rendered inside the box for the first time
      error_msg - The error message that will be shown when the showErrorMsg(boolean) method will enable the error message rendering
      max_chars - The maximum number of characters that can be typed in the input text box

    • InputText

      public InputText(String label, String str, String error_msg)
      Initialize InputText fields
      Parameters:
      label - The input text box label
      str - The string that will be rendered inside the box for the first time
      error_msg - The error message that will be shown when the showErrorMsg(boolean) method will enable the error message rendering

    • InputText

      str - The string that will be rendered inside the box for the first time

      public InputText(String label)
      Initialize InputText fields

      label - The input text box label

  • Method Details

    • render

      public boolean render()
      Renders to screen the input text box
      Returns:
      True when the user is typing by default, but if the setEnterReturnsTrue(boolean) method set the flag to true, then the function will return true only if the user presses enter while the input text has focus

    • setNoSpaces

      public void setNoSpaces(boolean enable)
      No spaces allowed in the text box
      Parameters:
      enable - True to enable, false to disable

    • setAlwaysUpperCase

      public void setAlwaysUpperCase(boolean enable)
      Converts every character into upper case
      Parameters:
      enable - True to enable, false to disable

    • setNumbersOnly

      public void setNumbersOnly(boolean enable)
      No alphabetic/punctuation characters allowed in the text box
      Parameters:
      enable - True to enable, false to disable

    • setReadOnly

      public void setReadOnly(boolean enable)
      The input text box can only be read
      Parameters:
      enable - True to enable, false to disable

    • setEnterReturnsTrue

      public void setEnterReturnsTrue(boolean enable)
      When not set, the default behavior for the render() method is to return true when the user types. When set, it returns true only if the user presses enter when the input text box has focus
      Parameters:
      enable - True to enable, false to disable

    • setPassword

      public void setPassword(boolean enable)
      Converts every character into a "*" symbol. Useful for password input
      Parameters:
      enable - True to enable, false to disable

    • showErrorMsg

      public void showErrorMsg(boolean enable)
      Sets if the error message should be seen
      Parameters:
      enable - True to enable, false to disable

    • setErrorMsg

      public void setErrorMsg(String msg)
      Sets the error message
      Parameters:
      msg - The desired error message

    • setString

      public void setString(String str)
      To reset the string to be rendered inside the input text box
      Parameters:
      str - The string inside the input text box

    • getString

      public String getString()
      Returns:
      The string inside the input text box

    • getMaxCharacters

      public int getMaxCharacters()
      Returns:
      The maximum number of characters

    • begin

      protected void begin()

    • end

      protected boolean end(boolean value)
